name: Meghaa Kalra
position: International Investment Consultant | Ex-Oister Global | Ex-LetsVenture

current_company.name: Nakheel Group
current_company.title: International Investment Consultant | Ex-Oister Global | Ex-LetsVenture

experience.title: Investor Engagement Manager
experience.description: Strategically streamlined investment inflows under direct sales initiative by fostering robust connections between the firm and prospective LPs/retail investors, thus optimizing investment processes. Facilitated direct connections between clients and leadership team, and spearheaded the development of organizational processes to enhance lead generation.
experience.description_html: Strategically streamlined investment inflows under direct sales initiative by fostering robust connections between the firm and prospective LPs/retail investors, thus optimizing investment processes. Facilitated direct connections between clients and leadership team, and spearheaded the development of organizational processes to enhance lead generation. <!---->

positions.subtitle: LetsVenture
positions.description: Facilitated fundraising and growth capital for portfolio startups, managing stakeholders and providing exit strategy analysis and advisory. Conducted investment analysis, negotiated valuations and deal structures, and led discussions with founders, HNIs, family offices, VCs, and other stakeholders. Sourced investment opportunities through ecosystem engagement and led fundraising across various sectors, including energy, sustainability, consumer internet, Gen AI, ed-tech, fin-tech, SaaS, food-tech, and health-tech. Developed organizational processes to resolve informational gaps and co-organized fundraising events to enhance engagement within the startup ecosystem.
positions.title: Portfolio Deal Manager
positions.description_html: Facilitated fundraising and growth capital for portfolio startups, managing stakeholders and providing exit strategy analysis and advisory. Conducted investment analysis, negotiated valuations and deal structures, and led discussions with founders, HNIs, family offices, VCs, and other stakeholders. Sourced investment opportunities through ecosystem engagement and led fundraising across various sectors, including energy, sustainability, consumer internet, Gen AI, ed-tech, fin-tech, SaaS, food-tech, and health-tech. Developed organizational processes to resolve informational gaps and co-organized fundraising events to enhance engagement within the startup ecosystem.

positions.subtitle: LetsVenture
positions.description: Managed ecosystem partners and led stakeholder engagement, bridged founders and investors to facilitate and complete the investment processes. Networked with High Net-worth Individual accounts (HNIs/Ultra-HNIs/Private Wealth Managers/Family Offices) and assisted them in optimising their investments.
positions.title: Investor Relations Manager
positions.description_html: Managed ecosystem partners and led stakeholder engagement, bridged founders and investors to facilitate and complete the investment processes. Networked with High Net-worth Individual accounts (HNIs/Ultra-HNIs/Private Wealth Managers/Family Offices) and assisted them in optimising their investments. <!---->

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Developed and executed business strategies to increase consumer engagement and brand visibility. Spearheaded the development and execution of a growth product to increase awareness regarding financial terms. Providing effective sales support such as running client demos and presentations.
